spec_data.Name: python2-btchip
spec_data.Description:
btchip-python is a python API for communicating primarily with the
Ledger HW.1 hardware bitcoin wallet. This library also adds compatibility
to Electrum in order to use the "Nano", "Nano S", and other Ledger-based
hardware wallets.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 04 Oct 2017 06:15:28 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Python communication library for Ledger Hardware Wallet products
